warns: Warning! If you are using Journey Map, you have to change it's file URL to https://media.forgecdn.net/files/2498/313/%5bsolder%5djourneymap-1.12.2-5.5.2.zip and it's MD5 to FD05AC891D40DB9AF9B9057F38BF9667 (for Minecraft 1.12.2). If you need more information, check http://journeymap.info/Technic or contact a human.
ltcl: Dark theme, client management, private builds and more. Check out the changelog in the Update section.
changelog:
v1.0.0.rc2


Additions:
  • Client management
  • Private modpacks and builds
  • Quick settings
  • Dark theme

Deletions:
  • Forge link verification - Fetching forge versions is now much faster
  • Sorting fetched forge versions

Changes and Fixes:
  • Updated bootstrap to v4.2.1
  • User is notified when changing forge version in a build
  • User is notified when changing modpack slug
  • Other minor bug fixes

v1.0.0.rc3


Changed page titles.
